statements: SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE balance BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY wallet_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM user_wallets GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 500 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_wallets WHERE balance < 50 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM user_wallets;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY wallet_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_name, user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_name, balance FROM users INNER JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, user_name, balance FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, balance FROM users LEFT JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id WHERE user_name = 'John';
SELECT user_id, user_name, IF(balance > 1000, 'Rich', 'Poor') AS wealth_status FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id ORDER BY wealth_status DESC, user_name ASC LIMIT 5;
